TopicTitle: The best free game/simulator recording/image taker besides Fraps free?

Articles.Content:
i don't want to download Fraps cracked version or pirated version because it's illegal. Is there any free game/simulator recording/image taker like Fraps?

Please Reply!

Thanks!

-CDK

https://obsproject.com/

Open Broadcast Software will let you do recordings. It's faster than fraps too.

If you have an Nvidia video card you can do shadowplay. It's fast enough that recording goes unnoticed.

https://obsproject.com/

Open Broadcast Software will let you do recordings. It's faster than fraps too.

Can you also take images?
bandicam, lets you record and take pics, compresses the video so you dont get massive file sizes and lets you record up to 10 mins

bandicam, lets you record and take pics, compresses the video so you dont get massive file sizes and lets you record up to 10 mins

Edited October 23, 2014 by CDK
I recommend OBS, its completely free, no watermark, no recording limit and the quality is good (from what I've seen so far).
If you want still images you can just press the F1 key ingame. F2 will hide all the GUI so you can shoot without the clutter. These get put in a screenshots folder in your game install folder.

If you want still images you can just press the F1 key ingame. F2 will hide all the GUI so you can shoot without the clutter. These get put in a screenshots folder in your game install folder.

Bandicam is quite free, but until paid it does splash its ID all over the top 1/10 of the screencap.

It does perform quite well though, I see no detectable delay due to capturing vid.
